texto: quantitative data. B.28 software all or part of the programs, procedures, rules, and associated documentation of an information processing system NOTE Software is an intellectual creation that is independent of the medium on which it is recorded. [ISO/IEC 2382-1:1993] B.29 software product the set of computer programs, procedures, and possibly associated documentation and data NOTE Products include intermediate products, and products intended for users such as developers and maintainers. [ISO/IEC 12207:1995] B.30 supplier an organisation that enters into a contract with the acquirer for the supply of a system, software product or software service under the terms of the contract [ISO/IEC
